get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Car resources.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page

GetCarItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /cars/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Greeting resources.

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page

GetGreetingItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /greetings/{id}`.

GetUserItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /users/{id}`.
